entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
